column5: Enjoy a relaxing stay in our large and beautiful condo! All of the comforts of home and only steps away from the sand. Relax on the very spacious balcony while you take in the awesome scenery. On your way back from the beach, enjoy a dip in one of the 3 pools or 3 hot tubs. Too much water? The complex features 4 tennis courts and a shuffleboard court at your disposal. Too much sun? We have TVs in each bedroom and a huge one in the living room. Come stay with us. You'll love it!
column8: Amazing views in this large, beachfront condo!
